name: Extreme Road Racing Championship | Free Car Game
name_original: Extreme Road Racing Championship | Free Car Game
description:
When night falls, Tokyo lights up. The perfect time to venture into the local illegal races, where you will gamble your car. The local mafia wants your car, so they won’t put it easy to you to survive this race. You'd better be the fastest in town if you do not want to lose!

Real cars
The amazing graphics and super-realistic models of sports cars are designed to impress you. Get on the car of your fantasies with this racing game!
Speed up, skid and make spinning tops that frighten pedestrians! Anything goes, but loose!

Japan night
Discover the amazing streets of Tokyo with this racing game! You might lose your car, so try not to get lost in its tricky streets! Don’t let the beautiful geishas distract you!

Wild race competition
Be careful, local bands do not like anyone to come and take away their fame. They will try their best to win and to get you off the road. Are you going to let them do it?
Experience the speed, dodge the enemies and enjoy the adrenaline of an endless race!

Do you hear the roar of the engines? Speed up, the competition is about to start!

Follow us on Twitter: @bravocterogames
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/bravocterogames
